WorkItem.ClosedComment: The default color as defined was White, changed that to Control. Only older OS's not using visual styles would be seeing this issue.
WorkItem.Description:
The headslot item in the optimizer results has a style applied to it of white.  (See attachment)
 
The rest of the fields use the background color of the current theme.
 
Request:  Change the background display color of the headslot item to use the current windows theme color.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer Results: Head slot color issue

Comments.Message: I believe that is actually a result of our code that turns the box red when you aren't satisfying your meta.
